meanings.definition: The quality or state of being oriented along the dorsal-ventral axis.
meanings.sent1: The dorsoventralities of the fish help it swim upright.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the dorsoventralities of animals to understand their body structures.
meanings.sent3: The dorsoventralities of the roller coaster made it a thrilling ride.
meanings.sent4: The dorsoventralities of the mountain range were clearly visible from the plane.
meanings.sent5: The dorsoventralities of the tree branches created a beautiful pattern against the sky.

meanings.sent1: The map clearly showed the dorsoventralities of the city streets.
meanings.sent2: The dorsoventralities of the arrow indicated the correct path to follow.
meanings.sent3: The dorsoventralities of the road sign confused the lost driver.
meanings.sent4: The dorsoventralities of the compass pointed towards the North Pole.
meanings.sent5: The dorsoventralities of the river flow determined the course of the boat.
